external_games.name: Monkey Tales: The Princess of Sundara

name: Monkey Tales: The Princess of Sundara
summary: The dragon Rinjin has kidnapped the very smart princess Ehimaya and holds her captive in an Arabian palace. Follow the trail of the dragon through the cellars of the palace, across the desert and oasis of Sundara, into the catacombs of the chapel where Rinjin is hiding.
